mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.IF_DATE || '|' || A.ECO_NO || '|' || A.NUM || '|' || A.SEQ GROUP_KEY, (SELECT S7_PART_TYPE FROM IF_VEHPART WHERE ITEM_ID = TRIM (A.MPNO) AND ROWNUM = 1) MPNO_PART_TYPE, (SELECT S7_PART_TYPE FROM IF_VEHPART WHERE ITEM_ID = TRIM (A.CPNO) AND ROWNUM = 1) CPNO_PART_TYPE, A.*, TO_CHAR(INFORM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INFORM_DATE_CHAR, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE_CHAR FROM IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM A WHERE IF_STATUS <> 'I' AND A.IF_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.ECO_NO LIKE #{ECO_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.IS_VALID = #{IS_VALID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.INFORM_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND A.INFORM_DATE IS NULL
AND A.END_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND A.END_DATE IS NULL
ORDER BY A.IF_DATE, A.ECO_NO, A.NUM, A.SEQ, A.CHANGE_DIV DESC) ECO
,(SELECT DISTINCT IF_DATE || '|' || ECO_NO || '|' || NUM || '|' || SEQ CPNO_GROUP_KEY FROM IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM WHERE CPNO LIKE #{CPNO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ECO_CPNO WHERE ECO.GROUP_KEY = ECO_CPNO.CPNO_GROUP_KEY ) ORDER BY IF_DATE, ECO_NO, NUM, SEQ, CHANGE_DIV DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM SET TC_USER = #{TC_USER, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TC_DEPT = #{TC_DEPT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM SET
INFORM_DATE = SYSDATE
INFORM_DATE = NULL
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM SET
END_DATE = SYSDATE
END_DATE = NULL
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT IF_DATE || '|' || ECO_NO || '|' || NUM || '|' || SEQ GROUP_KEY, ECO_NO, NUM, SEQ, CHANGE_TYPE, MPNO, MPNO_VER, CPNO, CPNO_VER, CHANGE_DIV, IF_DATE, MOD_DATE FROM IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM WHERE IF_STATUS = 'I' AND IS_VALID IS NULL ORDER BY IF_DATE, ECO_NO, NUM, SEQ, CHANGE_DIV DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_VPM SET IF_STATUS = 'V', IS_VALID = ( SELECT is_valid_PART_NUMBER( #{OLD_PARENT_ITEM_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OLD_PARENT_REV_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OLD_CHILD_ITEM_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OLD_CHILD_REV_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEW_PARENT_ITEM_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEW_PARENT_REV_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEW_CHILD_ITEM_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEW_CHILD_REV_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHANGE_TYPE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) FROM DUAL ) WHERE ECO_NO = #{ECO_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NUM = #{NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SEQ = #{SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IF_DATE = #{IF_DATE, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND IF_STATUS = 'I'

UPDATE IF_VEHPART SET IS_VALID = #{IS_VALID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_STATUS = 'V', IF_ERROR_MSG = NULL, IF_VPM_ECO_NO = #{IF_VPM_ECO_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_VPM_NUM = #{IF_VPM_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_VPM_SEQ = #{IF_VPM_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_VPM_CHANGE_TYPE = #{IF_VPM_CHANGE_TYPE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REVISION_ID = #{REVISION_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IF_DATE = #{IF_DATE, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND IF_STATUS = 'I' AND IS_VALID IS NULL

UPDATE IF_VEHPART A SET A.IF_STATUS = 'V', A.IF_ERROR_MSG = NULL, A.IS_VALID = ( SELECT is_valid_PART_NUMBER( null, null, null, null, null, null, A.ITEM_ID, A.REVISION_ID, 'R0' ) FROM DUAL ) WHERE A.IF_STATUS = 'I' AND A.IS_VALID IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VEH.IF_DATE || '|' || VEH.ITEM_ID || '|' || VEH.REVISION_ID GROUP_KEY , S7_PROJECT_CODE, veh.S7_PART_TYPE, veh.ITEM_ID , get_display_part_no2(veh.s7_part_type, veh.ITEM_ID) s7_display_part_no , veh.S7_MATURITY, veh.NAME, veh.S7_KOR_NAME, veh.S7_MAIN_NAME, veh.S7_SUB_NAME , veh.DESCRIPTION, veh.S7_LOC1_FR, veh.S7_LOC2_IO, veh.S7_LOC3_UL, veh.S7_LOC4_EE , veh.S7_LOC5_LR, veh.S7_REFERENCE, veh.S7_UNIT, veh.S7_ECO_NO, veh.S7_COLOR , veh.S7_COLOR_ID, veh.S7_REGULATION, veh.S7_MATTERIAL, veh.S7_ALT_MATERIAL , veh.S7_THICKNESS, veh.S7_FINISH, veh.S7_DRW_STAT, veh.S7_SHOW_PART_NO , veh.S7_EST_WEIGHT, veh.S7_CAL_WEIGHT, veh.S7_ACT_WEIGHT, veh.S7_CAL_SURFACE , veh.S7_BOUNDINGBOX, veh.S7_DVP_RESULT, veh.S7_RESPONSIBILITY, veh.S7_STAGE , veh.S7_REGULAR_PART, veh.S7_AS_END_ITEM, veh.S7_SELECTIVE_PART, veh.S7_CHANGE_DESCRIPTION , veh.S7_DRW_SIZE, veh.S7_SYSTEM_CODE, veh.S7_SUB_SYSTEM_CODE, veh.REVISION_ID, veh.PSTATUS , veh.PLAST_MOD_DATE, veh.RLAST_MOD_USER, veh.ROWING_GROUP, veh.ROWNIG_USER , veh.PCREATION_DATE, veh.V_CREATOR, veh.S7_ALT_THICKNESS, veh.MIG_FLAG, veh.MIG_SEQ , veh.S7_CAT_V4_TYPE, veh.IF_DATE, veh.IS_VALID, veh.IF_STATUS, veh.IF_ERROR_MSG , veh.IF_VPM_ECO_NO, veh.IF_VPM_NUM, veh.IF_VPM_SEQ, veh.IF_VPM_CHANGE_TYPE, veh.VPM_ECO FROM IF_VEHPART VEH WHERE VEH.IF_STATUS = 'V' AND VEH.IS_VALID IN ('Y', 'N') ) ORDER BY IF_DATE, ITEM_ID, REVISION_ID, PLAST_MOD_DATE

SELECT PART_NO, REVISION_ID, CAD_TYPE, NAME DATASET_NAME, FILE_PATH, REVISION_ID FILE_REVISION_ID, V4_TYPE, PART_REV, IF_REF, NON_EPL FROM IF_FILE A WHERE PART_NO = #{partNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REVISION_ID = #{revId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IF_DATE = #{ifDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.IF_DATE || '|' || A.ECO_NO || '|' || A.NUM || '|' || A.SEQ GROUP_KEY, (SELECT S7_PART_TYPE FROM IF_VEHPART WHERE ITEM_ID = TRIM (A.MPNO) AND ROWNUM = 1) MPNO_PART_TYPE, (SELECT S7_PART_TYPE FROM IF_VEHPART WHERE ITEM_ID = TRIM (A.CPNO) AND ROWNUM = 1) CPNO_PART_TYPE, A.*, TO_CHAR(INFORM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INFORM_DATE_CHAR, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE_CHAR FROM IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_TC A WHERE A.IF_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.ECO_NO LIKE #{ECO_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.IS_VALID = #{IS_VALID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.INFORM_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND A.INFORM_DATE IS NULL
AND A.END_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND A.END_DATE IS NULL
ORDER BY A.IF_DATE, A.ECO_NO, A.NUM, A.SEQ, A.CHANGE_DIV DESC) ECO
,(SELECT DISTINCT IF_DATE || '|' || ECO_NO || '|' || NUM || '|' || SEQ CPNO_GROUP_KEY FROM IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_TC WHERE CPNO LIKE #{CPNO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ECO_CPNO WHERE ECO.GROUP_KEY = ECO_CPNO.CPNO_GROUP_KEY ) ORDER BY IF_DATE, ECO_NO, NUM, SEQ, CHANGE_DIV DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_TC SET TC_USER = #{TC_USER, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TC_DEPT = #{TC_DEPT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_TC SET
INFORM_DATE = SYSDATE
INFORM_DATE = NULL
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE IF_ECO_INFO_FROM_TC SET
END_DATE = SYSDATE
END_DATE = NULL
WHERE GUID = #{GUID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (S_PART_NUMBER) FROM ( SELECT S_PART_NUMBER FROM VEHPART.PART_LIST@LINK_005_VPM UNION ALL SELECT S_PART_NUMBER FROM PTPART.PART_LIST@LINK_005_VPM ) PT WHERE TRIM(PT.S_PART_NUMBER) = #{partNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from part_check_dr_master where replace(replace(lower(part_name), ' ','') ,' and ' ,'' ) = replace( replace(lower(#{partName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), ' ','') ,' and ' ,'' )
